modName: Path Of The Revenant DSR Patch
summary: A Path Of The Revenant patch for DSR.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]A small patch I made for the convenience of those using HeirOfTheSeptims excellent Path Of The Revenant and Dual Sheath Redux.[/size]
[size=3]This is simply a mesh that allows Dual Sheath Redux to display the sheathed Staff Of Worms.I Made this to spare others the trouble of patching it themselves.[/size][*][size=3]Mods Required[/size]
[size=3]Path Of The Revenant : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71717/?
Dual Sheath Redux: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?


Installation Guide
[/size][/list][size=3]-Download manually or with a mod manager. 
-Delete the Dual Sheath Redux Patch .esp from your Mod Organizer DSR folder or yout Skyrim Data folder if you used NMM.
-Rerun your Dual Sheath Redux Patcher.
-Activate the new Dual Sheath Redux Patch. esp in your mod manager. 


Credits
-HeirOfTheSeptims for creating the excellent Path Of The Revenant mod and allowing people to create/upload DSR patches for it. 
-Slothability for his guide on creating DSR patches.[/size]
author: Linnsanity

files.name: Path Of The Revenant Patch For Dual Sheath Redux
